```{r}

CalcLowUse<- function(df){ 
  df %>%
  select(LSOA_CODE, LowUse) %>%
        left_join(., EW2, by = c("LSOA_CODE" = "ECODE")) %>% 
        group_by(Admin_ward_code)  %>%
        mutate(LowUsePerc = round(LowUse/Homes *100), 
               WardLowUse = sum(LowUse) ,
               WardLowUsePerc = round(WardLowUse/sum(Homes)*100)) %>% 
        ungroup %>% 
        left_join(., MeanWardPrice, by = "Admin_ward_code") %>% 
        mutate(ValLow = LowUse*MeanPrice,
               LowuseClass = cut(LowUsePerc, c(-1,10,20, 30,100), 
                                 labels =  c("0-10","11-20","21-30", "30+")),
               WardLowuseClass = cut(WardLowUsePerc, c(0,10,20, 30, 100), 
                                     labels = c("0-10","11-20","21-30", "30+")) )
}
```

```{r}
CorePstCd <- PstCdLSOA.raw %>%
  left_join(EW2, by = c("lsoa11cd" = "ECODE")) %>%
  select(Postcode, lsoa11cd, LAD11CD, LAD11NM, Admin_ward_code, WD16NM)

CompanyData <- read_delim(file2load2, delim = "*", col_names = F) %>%
  mutate(X15 = gsub(" ", "", X15)) %>%
  left_join(., CorePstCd, by = c("X15" = "Postcode"))


LSOABiz <- CompanyData %>%
  filter(!is.na(LAD11CD)) %>%
  mutate(X6 = gsub("( AND PREMISES)|( & PREMISES)", "",X6),
         X6 = gsub("(AND PREMISES)|(& PREMISES)", "",X6)) %>%
  group_by(lsoa11cd, X6) %>%
  summarise(counts = n(),
            LAD11CD = first(LAD11CD),
            LAD11NM = first(LAD11NM),
            Admin_ward_code = first(Admin_ward_code),
            WD16NM = first(WD16NM)) 



FirmCounts <- LSOABiz %>%
  group_by(X6) %>%
  summarise(counts = n()) %>%
  arrange(-counts)

Dom <- FirmCounts %>%
  filter(grepl("DOMESTIC",X6))

HOLS <- FirmCounts %>%
  filter(grepl("HOLIDAY",X6))

Catering <- FirmCounts %>%
  filter(grepl("SELF CATER",X6))
```
